channel.title: Useful on ShadowNode Modded Game Servers
channel.description: Recent content in Useful on ShadowNode Modded Game Servers

item.title: Useful mods
item.description: Intro Here you can find useful client side mods. Most listed mods are for version 1.16+ and focused to Forge Optimization mods Rubidium is a rendering optimization mod which greatly improves frame rates and stuttering while fixing many graphical issues (a fork of Fabric mod Sodium) Starlight a forge mod that rewrites the light engine to fix lighting performance and lighting errors. FerriteCore is a mod that reduces the memory usage of Minecraft in a few different ways.
